lead_paragraph: Blake Bortles has the Jaguars clinging to playoff dreams, and an injured Drew Brees, or a healthy Matt Flynn, should not stand in the way of Jacksonville’s first six-win season since 2008.

headline.main: Jacksonville Jaguars at New Orleans Saints Preview

snippet: Blake Bortles has the Jaguars clinging to playoff dreams, and an injured Drew Brees, or a healthy Matt Flynn, should not stand in the way of Jacksonville’s first six-win season since 2008.
